abstract: Purpose is a uniquely powerful source of fuel – and satisfaction. That’s why we resonate so strongly with exhortations that speak to it, the author writes.
snippet: Purpose is a uniquely powerful source of fuel – and satisfaction. That’s why we resonate so strongly with exhortations that speak to it, the author writes.
lead_paragraph: In the last several weeks, I had two radically different experiences spending extended time with leaders at two large, global companies. A long, alcohol-fueled dinner with the first group was a pure downer: dull, rote and devoid of positive energy.

headline.main: What Gets You Up in the Morning?

abstract: People contacted in connection with the case said that regulators were asking questions about Google’s bundling of advertising services.
snippet: People contacted in connection with the case said that regulators were asking questions about Google’s bundling of advertising services.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Google’s rivals have again prompted antitrust investigators at the Federal Trade Commission to examine the company’s business practices, and staff members have begun a preliminary look at whether Google abuses its market dominance in online display advertising, like the banner ads on Web pages.

headline.main: F.T.C. Is Said to Begin a New Inquiry on Google
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Is Said to Have Begun a New Inquiry on Google
